projects.title: Snake
projects.caption: Eat food and grow!
projects.description: A retro and nostalgic, monochrome Nokia bar phone inspired snake game developed with vanilla Javascript. It manipulates DOM elements and uses event handlers to detect user input and control game flow. Move (←↑→↓) to control the snake, eat food to grow longer and avoid collision. Play now!

projects.title: L'Mau
projects.caption: Fashion forward feline shopping site
projects.description: This is a full stack e-commerce shopping site with created with React, REST API architecture, data management with mongoose and MongoDB, state management with Redux. Styled with Bootstrap.

projects.title: Daily Tasks
projects.caption: Daily To-Do List
projects.description: Keep track of all your tasks with this beautiful, yet simple, javascript todo list app. This project showcases the power of css and how it transforms a plain old to do list into a stylish one. I'm quire proud of this one.

projects.title: Omakase
projects.caption: Restaurant Homepage
projects.description: Inspired by my love for anything sushi, this project is a fully responsive website created with html and styled with Material Design for Bootstrap and custom css.

projects.title: iFlix
projects.caption: Movie Web API
projects.description: This is a full stack movie web application using server-side REST API architecture with Node/Express, data management with mongoose and MongoDB Atlas, client-side interface with REACT, styled with React Bootstrap. {testUser: cat, password: cat}

projects.title: Pokédex
projects.caption: Gen 1. Pokémon Database
projects.description: Recreating a fond childhood memory, I built this app with React and data from the PokéAPI. Click on a Pokémon card to see a detailed page with data, sprites, evolutions, moves and more! Gotta Catch 'Em All!

projects.title: Tic-Tac-Toe
projects.caption: X vs O game
projects.description: An old school paper and pencil game for 2 players, X and O, who take turns marking the spaces on the grid. The player who succeeds in placing 3 of their marks horizonally, vertically or diagonally wins!

projects.title: Meetup
projects.caption: Find events in your city!
projects.description: This serverless, progressive web app is built with React, implementing test driven development. I use AWS Lambda as the serverless compute service as well as the MeetupAPI to fetch upcoming events for a selected city.

projects.title: Tetris
projects.caption: Tile matching game
projects.description: Another one of my favorite games growing up, this pure Javascript tetris clone showcases basic js methods, as well as DOM manipulations and user events to move game pieces. Press (←↓→, space) to control the tetrominoes. Play now!
